themes: preference for funding institutions over individual artists
key_phrases: grant making should generally be to venues and institutions that can be held accountable
meet specific goals and report back
except perhaps in the case of permanent public art installations
solutions_proposed: Direct city grantmaking to venues and institutions that can be held accountable to meet specific goals and report back
Require institutions to use funds to expand diversity in programming and reach new audiences
Fund artists directly only in the case of permanent public art installations
